cnd13:6.1: Yasmiṃ kāmā na vasantīti yasmiṃ kāmā na vasanti na saṃvasanti na āvasanti na parivasantīti—
cnd13:6.10: Todeyyoti tassa brāhmaṇassa nāmaṃ … pe … abhilāpoti—
cnd13:7.1: Taṇhā yassa na vijjatīti taṇhā yassa natthi na atthi na saṃvijjati nupalabbhati ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāti—
cnd13:8.1: Kathaṃkathā ca yo tiṇṇoti kathaṃkathā ca yo tiṇṇo uttiṇṇo nitthiṇṇo atikkanto samatikkanto vītivattoti—
cnd13:9.1: Vimokkho tassa kīdisoti vimokkho tassa kīdiso kiṃsaṇṭhito kiṃpakāro kiṃpaṭibhāgo icchitabboti vimokkhaṃ pucchatīti—
cnd13:12.9: Yasmiṃ kāmā na vasantīti yasmiṃ kāmā na vasanti na saṃvasanti na āvasanti na parivasantīti—
cnd13:13.2: Todeyyāti bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ nāmena ālapati.
cnd13:14.2: Taṇhāti rūpataṇhā saddataṇhā gandhataṇhā rasataṇhā phoṭṭhabbataṇhā dhammataṇhā.
cnd13:14.4: Taṇhā yassa na vijjatīti taṇhā yassa natthi na atthi na saṃvijjati nupalabbhati, pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭippassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāti—
cnd13:15.1: Kathaṃkathā ca yo tiṇṇoti kathaṃkathā vuccati vicikicchā.
cnd13:15.6: Kathaṃkathā ca yo tiṇṇoti kathaṃkathā ca yo tiṇṇo uttiṇṇo nitthiṇṇo atikkanto samatikkanto vītivattoti—
cnd13:16.1: Vimokkho tassa nāparoti natthi tassa aparo vimokkho.
cnd13:19.1: Nirāsaso so uda āsasānoti nittaṇho so, udāhu sataṇho rūpe āsīsati, sadde … pe …
cnd13:19.32: diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbe dhamme āsīsati sādiyati pattheti piheti abhijappatīti—
cnd13:20.2: Paññāṇavā soti paṇḍito paññavā buddhimā ñāṇī vibhāvī medhāvī.
cnd13:20.3: Uda paññakappīti udāhu aṭṭhasamāpattiñāṇena vā pañcābhiññāñāṇena vā micchāñāṇena vā taṇhākappaṃ vā diṭṭhikappaṃ vā kappeti janeti sañjaneti nibbatteti abhinibbattetīti—
cnd13:21.4: Atha vā aḍḍho mahaddhano dhanavātipi sakko.
cnd13:21.6: saddhādhanaṃ sīladhanaṃ hiridhanaṃ ottappadhanaṃ sutadhanaṃ cāgadhanaṃ paññādhanaṃ satipaṭṭhānadhanaṃ sammappadhānadhanaṃ iddhipādadhanaṃ indriyadhanaṃ baladhanaṃ bojjhaṅgadhanaṃ maggadhanaṃ phaladhanaṃ nibbānadhananti.
cnd13:21.7: Tehi anekavidhehi dhanaratanehi aḍḍho mahaddhano dhanavātipi sakko.
cnd13:21.8: Atha vā sakko pahu visavī alamatto sūro vīro vikkanto abhīrū acchambhī anutrāsī apalāyī pahīnabhayabheravo vigatalomahaṃsotipi sakko.
cnd13:21.9: Muniṃ ahaṃ sakka yathā vijaññanti sakka yathāhaṃ muniṃ jāneyyaṃ ājāneyyaṃ vijāneyyaṃ paṭivijāneyyaṃ paṭivijjheyyanti—
cnd13:22.2: Tanti yaṃ pucchāmi yaṃ yācāmi yaṃ ajjhesāmi yaṃ pasādemi.
cnd13:22.3: Viyācikkhāti ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehi.
cnd13:25.1: Nirāsaso so na ca āsasānoti nittaṇho so.
cnd13:25.6: diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbe dhamme nāsīsati na icchati na sādiyati na pattheti na piheti nābhijappatīti—
cnd13:26.2: Paññāṇavāti paṇḍito paññavā buddhimā ñāṇī vibhāvī medhāvī.
cnd13:26.3: Na ca paññakappīti aṭṭhasamāpattiñāṇena vā pañcābhiññāñāṇena vā micchāñāṇena vā taṇhākappaṃ vā na kappeti diṭṭhikappaṃ vā na kappeti na janeti na sañjaneti na nibbatteti nābhinibbattetīti—
cnd13:27.5: Evampi todeyya muniṃ vijānāti todeyya, evaṃ muniṃ jāna paṭijāna paṭivijāna paṭivijjhāti—
cnd13:28.2: Akiñcananti rāgakiñcanaṃ dosakiñcanaṃ mohakiñcanaṃ mānakiñcanaṃ diṭṭhikiñcanaṃ kilesakiñcanaṃ duccaritakiñcanaṃ.
cnd13:28.3: Yassetāni kiñcanāni pahīnāni samucchinnāni vūpasantāni paṭippassaddhāni abhabbuppattikāni ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāni, so vuccati akiñcano.
